ProbableCases: A 50 year old male presented with **headache, nausea, vomiting, pain in right eye with redness and H/O coloured halos** around light. On Examination, **visual acuity was 1/60 and intraocular pressure was 50 mmHg**. On Slit Lamp Examination there were, RE: **circumcorneal congestion, corneal edema and shallow anterior chamber with mid dilated pupil**.
